About the job
    


          Position Summary...
What you'll do...
We're looking for a Senior Data Scientist to lead and create initiatives for future strategies across Walmart's omnichannel supply chain. This is a high-impact, high-visibility role within the organization with expectations to deliver immediate results. In this role, you'll primarily be responsible for creating a long-term strategy and transformative path for Walmart's rapidly growing omnichannel business.
About CENTROID
Walmart's CENTROID org is transforming the future of Walmart's omnichannel supply chain strategy. Our team of industry-leading experts, consultants, and technologists combine exceptional strategic thinking with data science and advanced analytics to solve the world's most complex supply chain challenges at Walmart's scale.
Our mission is to design a supply chain that leverages Walmart's unique advantages to provide a wide product assortment, offer the lowest costs, and build cutting-edge capabilities through transformative initiatives. We're looking for extraordinary supply chain talent with top-notch quantitative abilities, critical thinking skills, and business acumen to propel Walmart through the next 50 years of excellence and innovation.
Responsibilities
Manage and execute entire projects from start to finish, including cross-functional project management, data collection and manipulation, analysis and modeling, and the communication of insights and recommendationsBuild scalable and complex supply chain models and processes to optimize supply chain strategies with the goal of delivering an excellent customer experience while balancing operating cost and asset efficiencyIdentify areas of opportunity and influence execution of results via cross-functional participation to enable quick wins and continuous improvement.Lead implementation of pilots to demonstrate business impact.Create and deploy robust metrics and dashboards to enable tangible transformation.Demonstrate a high degree of originality and creativity when developing solutions to improve existing business processes within supply chain utilizing methods such as statistical modeling and optimization.Work with multiple supply chain business teams to proactively identify, assess cost saving/service level improvement opportunities.Independently size, evaluate business monetary value of these opportunities and create quick Proof-of-Concept (POC) and working prototype models. You will layout multiple scenarios and perform sensitivity analysis across the.You will come up with inferences through your models that will enable appropriate policy design across various areas of the supply chain.Build scalable and complex supply chain models and processes to optimize supply chain strategies with goals to deliver excellent customer experience while balancing operating cost and asset efficiency.Identify areas of opportunity and drive results partnering with cross functional partners.Develop relationships with Wal-Mart functional areas to identify best practices, solicit input/data, coordinate inter-disciplinary initiatives and to gather support for recommendations.Guide and create compelling stories/documents/visuals to influence key stakeholders in their decision-making
You Will Thrive In This Role If You
Enjoy working independently to manage multiple projects while ensuring deadlines are met and data output is accurate and appropriate for the business.Can deal with ambiguity and make independent decisions about what data and approach is best for the task at hand.Excel in communicating with individuals and groups at all levels of an organization
Potential Projects Include
Create models to analyze the Supply Chain network needed to support future sales growth with scenario modeling capabilities to understand the sensitivity to multiple variables; opening, closing, or repurposing supply chain assets in the first, middle or last mile; conduct scenario analysis to evaluate multiple networks designs and impact to customer experience and cost to serv.Develop optimization logic and a tools to determine drone strategy for last mile customer delivery, balancing cost, regulations and SLA requirements

MBA, MS, or PhD in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Operations Management, or Supply Chain Management.Experience with large dataset mining tools and open-source programming tools (e.g., R, Python, HiveQL, Spark)Very strong Mathematical/Statistical Acumen and Algorithms development ability.4+ years of experience in solving problems with advanced analytics like Optimization, Simulation, Predictive Modeling, Combinatorics Problems etc.Experience with network modeling tools (e.g., Llamasoft Supply Chain Guru), network optimization, and long-range planning .Experience in supply chain domains and related information systems - distribution/transportation, sourcing, planning, manufacturing, and inventory management.Retail industry experience

Process large scale Walmart datasets using distributed cloud computing technologies to create and maintain 3D assets for the Walmart catalog.Use computer vision techniques to create advanced deep learning models for 2D/3D image generation and synthesis, image classification, scene segmentation, object detection, keypoint detection.Build and maintain ML/DL model pipelines and services with a focus on latency, throughput, and scalability.End to end ownership and collaboration with product, engineering, vendors, and annotation partners to drive production ML application integrations and maintenance.Collaborate with other internal Walmart Data Science teams to enable high quality user experiences powered by AI/ML around computer vision.Read and implement research papers, strive for improvements in all aspects of the Computer Vision ML pipeline from better data generation techniques, more performant algorithms to highly efficient model deployments.
Minimum Qualifications
Master's degree in Computer Science with specialization in computer vision and/or machine learning or equivalent practical experience.3 years of experience with machine learning algorithms and tools and 1 year of experience in deep learning. Experience in launching Machine Learning models in products and building production pipelines/services.Experience with TensorFlow, Tensorflow 3D, Pytorch, Pytorch3D, JAX, numpy, C++, Python, Unix, Docker, CPU and GPU architectures.Experience with publishing at conferences/journals in Machine learning/Computer Vision
Preferred Qualifications
Master's degree or PhD in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field.1 year of experience in a technical leadership role for an applied research project with an industry application use-case.Experience with 3D Real-time rendering of scenes, objects using NeRF and other more recent neural approaches.Experience writing architectures with CNNs, vision transformers and pre-training from scratch/fine-tuning.Experience with deep learning for synthetic data generation using GANs, diffusion models, multimodal architectures like CLIP.Experience with Few-shot learning, transfer learning, unsupervised and semi-supervised methods, contrastive learning, active learning, weakly supervised auto labeling, semantic search index.Experience with GCS, BigQuery, Nvidia Toolkits or equivalent.Demonstrated knowledge of the following programming Languages: Java, Python, Bash, Spark (SQL, Streaming), Hadoop Map-Reduce experience. Build Manager (Maven), Distributed Version Control (GIT), Continuous Integration (Jenkins) experience.Bonus
Experience in Pytorch 3D, Nvidia Kaolin is a plus.Experience in building Augmented Reality applications using Unity or other AR SDK'sExperience with Mixed Reality/Virtual Reality(Holo Lens, Gear, Occulus, Vive, Rift.)Experience in using 3D Modelling tools such as Maya, Blender and other photogrammetry tooling.Experience in Game Design, 3D modelling, and 3D Computer Graphics is a plus

About CENTROID
Walmart's CENTROID organization is transforming the future of Walmart's omnichannel Supply Chain strategy. Our team of industry-leading experts, consultants, and technologists combine exceptional strategic thinking with data science and advanced analytics to solve the world's most complex Supply Chain challenges at Walmart's scale.
Our mission is to design a Supply Chain that leverages Walmart's unique advantages to provide a wide product assortment, offer the lowest costs, fastest speeds, and build cutting-edge technologies to improve customer experience. We're looking for extraordinary Supply Chain talent with top-notch quantitative abilities, critical thinking skills, and business acumen to propel Walmart through the next 50 years of excellence and innovation.
Job Description
We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist and Supply Chain professional to own and drive initiatives for the future strategies across Walmart's omnichannel Supply Chain. In this role, the candidate will create the long-term strategy to transform Walmart's rapidly growing omnichannel business. This is a high-impact, high-visibility role with opportunities to collaborate cross functionally and deliver immediate tangible results.
Responsibilities
Manage and execute projects from start to finish, including cross-functional project management, data collection, modeling and analysis, synthesis and communication of insights and recommendations to cross functional stakeholders Build scalable and complex Supply Chain models and processes that optimize end-to-end Supply Chain with the goal of delivering excellent customer experience while balancing operating costs and asset efficiency Demonstrate a high degree of originality and creativity when developing solutions to improve existing business processes within Supply Chain, utilizing methods such as statistical analysis, regression modeling, and optimization Obtain alignment from relevant business partners to ensure projects are successful and lead discussions to drive change Identify areas of opportunity and influence execution of results via cross-functional participation to enable quick wins and continuous improvement Lead implementation of pilots to demonstrate business impact Create and deploy robust metrics and dashboards to enable tangible transformation 
You Will Thrive In This Role If You
Enjoy working independently to manage multiple projects while ensuring deadlines are met and data output is accurate and appropriate for the business Can deal with ambiguity and make independent decisions about what data and approach is best for the task at hand Excel in communicating complex business and technical solutions to individuals and groups at all levels of an organization 
Potential Projects Include
Create models to analyze the Supply Chain network needed to support future sales growth with scenario modeling capabilities to understand the sensitivity to multiple variables; opening, closing, or repurposing distribution centers; conduct scenario analysis to evaluate multiple networks designs and impact to customer experience and cost to serve Develop optimization logic and a tool to determine truckload lane strategy for outbound transportation, balancing cost and SLA requirements 
Additional Preferred Qualifications
MBA, MS, or PhD in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Operations Management, or Supply Chain Management Experience with large dataset mining tools and open-source programming tools (e.g., R, Python, HiveQL, Spark) Experience with network modeling tools (e.g., Llamasoft Supply Chain Guru), network optimization, and long-range planning Experience in Supply Chain domains and related information systems -distribution/transportation, sourcing, planning, manufacturing, and inventory management Experience in Retail industry 
Benefits & Perks
Beyond competitive pay, you can receive incentive awards for your performance. Other great perks include 401(k) match, stock purchase plan, paid maternity and parental leave, PTO, multiple health plans, and much more.
